Key Match Events: Ryan Christie scored a goal in the 32nd minute.
Andrej Kramaric equalized for Croatia in the 70th minute.
VAR ruled out a potential equalizer from Ch√© Adams in the 95th minute due to offside.
Pre-Game Insights: Ben Doak, a Liverpool teenager on loan at Middlesbrough, was handed a first Scotland start.
Steve Clarke praised the performance and expressed belief in the team's future despite the loss.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke expressed frustration that a deserved draw was taken away by VAR.
Clarke stated that the team needs a break and believes they are on the right path.
Duje Caleta-Car made an almighty mess of his attempted clearance in the first half.
Miscellaneous Highlights: John Souttar blocked well from Andrej Kramaric in the first half.
Ivan Perisic created the equalizing goal for Croatia.
Scottish goalkeeper Craig Gordon made several saves, including preventing Luka Modric from scoring in the second half.
